title: Notebook
text:
Load Python libaries and API keys.

import os
import openai
import pandas as pd
import altair as alt
from dotenv import load_dotenv, find_dotenv


_ = load_dotenv(find_dotenv()) # read local .env file
openai.api_key  = os.environ['OPENAI_API_KEY']

import os

title: Workflow
text:
This is a Quarto slidedeck.

Create new labs GitHub-Repo
Create new branch gh-pages
Change settings in page: gh-pages and root
Open VS Code
Change Quarto seetings in files
Render all in terminal: quarto render
Push to GitHub
